ProhibitedInterfaceBuilder.description:
Description

Creating views using Interface Builder should be avoided.
Defining views by code allows the compiler to detect issues that otherwise will be runtime errors.
Itâ€™s difficult to review the auto-generated code and allow concurrent modifications of those files.
Consider building views programmatically.

Example(s):

Use this rule by referencing it:
ProhibitedInterfaceBuilder.option: This rule has no specific options.
